meanings.definition: To turn into or make into a myth.
meanings.sent1: The storyteller was mythicizing the ancient tale for the children.
meanings.sent2: The author was mythicizing the historical event in her novel.
meanings.sent3: By mythicizing the ordinary cat, the children created a magical feline hero.
meanings.sent4: Her words mythicized the mundane into a world of legends and wonders.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush mythicized the landscape, transforming it into a mystical realm.

meanings.definition: To give a mythical quality to something.
meanings.sent1: The movie director was mythicizing the hero to make him larger than life.
meanings.sent2: The poet was mythicizing nature in her verses.
meanings.sent3: By mythicizing the old tree, the painter turned it into a magical symbol.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling mythicized the ordinary town into a land of enchantment.
meanings.sent5: The ancient legend mythicized the brave warrior, making him a mythical figure.
